name: Soul Bond (Mr.ToadFrog)
description:
Your soul is being stolen, but it's not gone yet. Before your soul dies off you and the soul thief are bonded. When you take damage so does he, take damage and heal yourself to defeat the soul thief and save your soul.

Taking damage deals damage in this simplistic bullet hell survival. Combo hits together to deal extra damage and speed up your time. 

Controls: Move with WASD or Arrow keys, use space or shift to dash (Dashing moves you faster and gives invincibility)

At any time press Escape to return to the main menu

Topic fit - Failing (getting hit) is how you deal damage to the boss (progress)

Hope you enjoy the game, this is my first 3 day game jam so a lot shorter time frame than I'm used to lol :) hope you like it.

Made in Godot for Wowie Game Jam 3
